nodes.text: Jysella Terrik was the wife of Booster Terrik and mother to Mirax Terrik. She died when Mirax was just a child.
Jysella Horn, one of Mirax's children, was named after her.
Although mentioned in several sources, the mother of Mirax and wife of Booster has never been officially named until the release of the sourcebook Scum and Villainy in 2008.
